description: T.N4 Red Horse Chestnut - Fell.T.94 Cedar of Lebanon - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.105 Turkey Oak - 2m reduction of primary branch to suitable growth points & remove old OPM nest.T.118 Indian Bean - 1-2m Holistic lateral reduction on all sides, shaping into upper crown sympathetically without reducing in height. All cuts to suitable growth points & any deadwood removed.T.110 Hornbeam - 1-2m Lateral reduction of east canopy to suitable secondary growth points.T.112 Hornbeam - Crown lift to 3m from ground level.T.113 Turkey Oak - Lateral reduction from building to provide 1-2m clearance with cuts made to suitable growth points.
